sentences.en: Doctors expect him to make a full recovery.
sentences.cn: 医生预计他能完全康复。

sentences.en: He made a remarkable recovery from a shin injury.
sentences.cn: 他的胫骨伤恢复得相当不错。

sentences.en: Hopes of economic recovery are fading.
sentences.cn: 经济复苏的希望越来越渺茫。

sentences.en: In many sectors of the economy the recovery has started.
sentences.cn: 许多经济领域已经开始复苏。

sentences.en: Interest rates would come down as the recovery gathered pace.
sentences.cn: 随着复苏的加速，利率会降下来。

sentences.en: Our main objective was the recovery of the child safe and well.
sentences.cn: 我们的主要目标是将孩子安然无恙地找回来。

sentences.en: Stagnation in home sales is holding back economic recovery.
sentences.cn: 国内销售的停滞不前正阻碍着经济复苏。

sentences.en: The bank has a three-pronged strategy for recovery.
sentences.cn: 银行有一套三管齐下的复苏战略。

sentences.en: The higher rates have been a hind-rance to economic recovery.
sentences.cn: 高利率已经成为经济复苏的障碍。

sentences.en: The horse made a mira-culous recovery to finish a close third.
sentences.cn: 这匹马奇迹般地恢复了状态，以微弱的劣势位居第三。

sentences.en: The Labor Department figures underscore the shaky state of the economic recovery.
sentences.cn: 劳工部的数据进一步印证了经济复苏状况的不稳定。

sentences.en: The level of inflation is a serious impediment to economic recovery.
sentences.cn: 通货膨胀是影响经济复苏的严重障碍。

sentences.en: The recent rebound in mortgage rates could snuff out the housing recovery.
sentences.cn: 抵押贷款利率最近的回升可能会扼杀房地产的复苏。

sentences.en: We will see some economic recovery, but it will be very anaemic.
sentences.cn: 我们将看到经济有所复苏，但这种复苏将是非常无力的。

sentences.en: We wish Bill a speedy recovery.
sentences.cn: 我们祝愿比尔快快康复。

words.tran_cn: 可收回的；可恢复的；可补偿的

phrases.tran_cn: 快速恢复；快速回收；快速列支；迅速复原

trans.tran_cn: 恢复，改善，失而复得，监护室
trans.tran_en: the process of getting better after an illness, injury etc
